Package gui.controllers

Class EmployeeHomeScreenController

java.lang.Object
gui.controllers.EmployeeHomeScreenController
public class EmployeeHomeScreenController extends Object
Controller for the employee home screen in the GUI. This controller handles the interactions and updates for the home screen where employees can manage items and log out.
